data.lyric:
[ti:Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:Santa Claus Came in the Spring]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer - Gene Autry
[00:04.01]Lyrics by：Gene Autry
[00:08.03]Composed by：Gene Autry
[00:12.04]You know dasher and dancer
[00:13.99]And prancer and vixen
[00:16.58]Comet and cupid
[00:17.96]And Donner and Blitzen
[00:20.76]But do you recall
[00:24.49]The most famous reindeer of all
[00:29.70]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[00:32.91]Had a very shiny nose
[00:36.23]And if you ever saw it
[00:39.56]You would even say it glows
[00:42.97]All of the other reindeer
[00:46.28]Used to laugh and call him names
[00:49.71]They never let poor Rudolph
[00:53.07]Join in any reindeer games
[00:56.63]Then one foggy Christmas Eve
[00:59.90]Santa came to say
[01:03.24]Rudolph with your nose so bright
[01:06.71]Won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[01:10.11]Then how the reindeer loved him
[01:13.44]As they shouted out with glee
[01:16.81]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[01:20.11]You'll go down in history
[02:17.66]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[02:20.75]Had a very shiny nose
[02:24.18]And if you ever saw it
[02:27.67]You would even say it glows
[02:31.05]All of the other reindeer
[02:34.54]Used to laugh and call him names
[02:37.98]They never let poor Rudolph
[02:41.44]Join in any reindeer games
[02:45.05]Then one foggy Christmas Eve
[02:48.42]Santa came to say
[02:51.80]Rudolph with your nose so bright
[02:55.39]Won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[02:58.77]Then how the reindeer loved him
[03:02.17]As they shouted out with glee
[03:05.66]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[03:09.15]You'll go down in history
data.trans:
[ti:Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:Santa Claus Came in the Spring]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:04.01]//
[00:08.03]//
[00:12.04]你知道飞毛腿和舞者
[00:13.99]欢爱的人和泼妇
[00:16.58]彗星和丘比特
[00:17.96]还有Donner和Blitzen
[00:20.76]但你是否记得
[00:24.49]最著名的驯鹿
[00:29.70]鲁道夫红鼻子驯鹿
[00:32.91]鼻子很闪亮
[00:36.23]如果你亲眼目睹
[00:39.56]你甚至会说它闪闪发光
[00:42.97]其他的驯鹿
[00:46.28]曾经嘲笑他还骂他
[00:49.71]他们绝不会让可怜的鲁道夫
[00:53.07]加入驯鹿游戏
[00:56.63]在一个大雾弥漫的平安夜
[00:59.90]圣诞老人对我说
[01:03.24]鲁道夫你的鼻子好明亮
[01:06.71]今晚你能否为我指引方向
[01:10.11]驯鹿那么爱他
[01:13.44]当他们欢呼雀跃时
[01:16.81]鲁道夫红鼻子驯鹿
[01:20.11]你会载入史册
[02:17.66]鲁道夫红鼻子驯鹿
[02:20.75]鼻子很闪亮
[02:24.18]如果你亲眼目睹
[02:27.67]你甚至会说它闪闪发光
[02:31.05]其他的驯鹿
[02:34.54]曾经嘲笑他还骂他
[02:37.98]他们绝不会让可怜的鲁道夫
[02:41.44]加入驯鹿游戏
[02:45.05]在一个大雾弥漫的平安夜
[02:48.42]圣诞老人对我说
[02:51.80]鲁道夫你的鼻子好明亮
[02:55.39]今晚你能否为我指引方向
[02:58.77]驯鹿那么爱他
[03:02.17]当他们欢呼雀跃时
[03:05.66]鲁道夫红鼻子驯鹿
[03:09.15]你会载入史册
